name: 李老师不是你老师
content: About the process of a child's fever to death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This man's mental state seems to be no more than fifteen years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @EricLiu_USA It seems there is also a black actor in Teletubbies

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @EricLiu_USA Actually you can watch the anti-Japanese drama. There are many good people, and there are also many good people in the bad camp. The whole drama is full of love and responsibility, there is no homosexual plot, and there are basically no black people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Are there any friends who followed me on Weibo and I didn’t follow back on Twitter? Please send me a private message.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A bunch of people are strung together on a rope, and they look like college students returning to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
However, it is interesting that this lady who did not do the nucleic acid test seemed to be one of the few people in the car wearing an FFP2 mask.
I have always been curious about why Chinese people are so afraid of this virus over the years, but most people, whether ordinary people or medical staff, always wear ordinary medical masks that have little protective effect.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
It is hard to imagine that the locals are still open to tourism during the lockdown, it is really magical.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xinjiang said that stranded tourists can work on the spot. It's very strange. You see, they used short videos to trick you from your hometown to travel, and then they didn't let you leave. Then they said you can just work and settle down here. You see, it's not that we don't care about you. We even kindly invited you to join us. You don't appreciate it and insist on leaving. This is your problem. You look down on our great Xinjiang. The focus of the discussion has changed from not letting you leave to why you don't want to stay.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the past, when a rural man wanted to buy a wife, the police came and the whole village would come out to stop him. We treated her very well and treated her as a villager. Since she was a villager, she couldn’t leave. But if you really gave birth to a child, they might let you go. Because the child is here, they are not afraid that you will not come back. Letting you go is to let you go home and take in some resources to enrich this beautiful family. That’s probably how it works.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
But what is the difference between this and buying a wife? The difference is that this is a two-way trip between you and Xinjiang.
Since you are willing to come to travel, why don’t you want to stay? Do you not want to stay because you think Xinjiang is not good? If you think Xinjiang is not good, then why did you come? Then are you here to cause trouble?
After several rounds of detours, you have gone from the stage of accountability to the stage of self-proof.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The various problems beyond common sense caused by the epidemic are essentially because the people who personally command and deploy the work do not have to take responsibility at all, so the people below do not want to take responsibility, so all the responsibilities fall on the people at the grassroots level.
Then the people at the grassroots level can only manage in the most extreme way to avoid making mistakes.
In fact, the fight against the epidemic has been won from the beginning, but it has not been announced yet, because it will not lose at all.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This is the Warring States Period.
